title: Schedule a Tour, Spa and Sauna, Flexible Lease Terms
posting_body: ['Capri Creek, managed by Sack Properties', '1900 Sestri Ln', 'Petaluma, CA 94954', 'show contact info', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>/', 'Lease today at Capri Creek.', 'Each spacious apartment home is carefully designed for maximum comfort, featuring large patios, vaulted ceilings, in-unit washers and dryers, and extra storage in every unit.', 'Soak up the sun at the pool, relax in the spa, work up a sweat in the fitness center, try out lawn bowling on our practice green, or even host a private event in our elegant clubhouse.', 'This one bedroom one bathroom apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with coat closet, washer/dryer, linen closet, and a patio/balcony with storage!', 'Monday 9:00am - 5:30pm', 'Tuesday 9:00am - 5:30pm', 'Wednesday 9:00am - 5:30pm', 'Thursday 9:00am - 5:30pm', 'Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm', 'Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm', 'Community Features', '* Guest Parking', '* Spa', '* Short or Long Term Lease Available', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* Long Term Lease Available', '* Cardio Room', '* Landscaped Courtyards', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Easy Access to Public Transportation', '* Sun Deck', '* Easy Freeway Access', '* Covered Parking', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* Smoke Free Community', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Credit Cards Accepted', '* Swimming Pool', '* Playground', '* Short Term Lease Available', '* Community Lounge', '* Package Acceptance', '* Reserved Parking', '* Professionally Managed', '[#9343787]']
